TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OleDbConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 提供簡單的方法，以建立和管理 類別使用之連接字串的內容。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串產生器 (Builder) 可讓開發人員使用類別的屬性和方法，以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串。The connection string builder lets developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 連接字串產生器提供強型別的屬性對應至 OLE DB 連線所允許的已知索引鍵/值組，開發人員可以新增任何其他的連接字串值的任意索引鍵/值組。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by OLE DB connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values. 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface. 這表示，此類別適用於 Visual Studio.NET 設計工具在設計階段。This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time. 當開發人員會使用設計工具，建置強型別資料集和強型別在 Visual Studio.NET 中的連線時，強型別的連接字串產生器類別會顯示它的型別相關聯的屬性，並也會有轉換器，對應至已知索引鍵的通用值。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式一部分的開發人員可以使用 類別來建置及修改連接字串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 此類別也可讓您輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔內的連接字串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 只執行一組有限的已知索引鍵/值組的檢查。The performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs. 因此，這個類別可用來建立無效的連接字串。Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings. 下表列出的已知索引鍵和其對應的屬性內類別和其預設值。The following table lists the known keys and their corresponding properties within the class, and their default values. 除了這些特定的值，開發人員可以將任何索引鍵/值組加入集合內所含執行個體：Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the instance: |KeyKey|屬性Property|預設值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |檔案名稱File Name||""""| |提供者Provider||""""| |資料來源Data Source||""""| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info||FalseFalse| |OLE DB 服務OLE DB Services||-13-13| 屬性能處理嘗試插入惡意的項目。The property handles attempts to insert malicious entries. 例如，下列程式碼，使用預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組：For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: ```vb Dim builder As _ New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Provider") = "Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0" builder("Data Source") = "C:\Sample.mdb" builder("User Id") = "Admin;NewValue=Bad" ``` ```csharp System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Provider"] = "Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0"; builder["Data Source"] = "C:\\Sample.mdb"; builder["User Id"] = "Admin;NewValue=Bad"; ``` 結果是以安全方式處理無效值的下列連接字串：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source=C:\Sample.mdb;User ID="Admin;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建立 OLE DB 的多個資料庫的連接字串。The following console application builds connection strings for several OLE DB databases. 首先，此範例會建立 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串，並接著會建立 IBM DB2 資料庫的連接字串。First, the example creates a connection string for a Microsoft Access database, and then creates a connection string for an IBM DB2 database. 此範例也會剖析現有的連接字串，並示範操作連接字串內容的各種方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的連接字串會提供執行個體內部連接資訊的資料。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，直接 (藉由設定屬性) 或藉由建構函式，做為參數傳遞的連接字串，可能會影響集合內所包含的索引鍵/值組執行個體。Setting the property, either directly (by setting the property) or by passing a connection string as a parameter to the constructor, may affect the set of key/value pairs that are contained within the instance. 設定"sqloledb，"的屬性，例如將所有的標準 SQL 連接字串屬性。Setting the property to "sqloledb," for example, adds all the standard SQL connection string properties. 請參閱本主題，如需示範此行為的範例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration of this behavior. 對於某些提供者，將連接字串內指派建構函式會導致提供索引鍵/值組的順序，重新排列。For some providers, assigning a connection string within the constructor causes the order of supplied key/value pairs to be rearranged. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個情況下，將不同的連接字串傳遞至每個案例的建構函式。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 請注意如何設定與連接相關聯的提供者會變更物件的集合中的預先定義的索引鍵/值組的集合。Note how setting the provider associated with the connection changes the set of predefined key/value pairs within the object's collection. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 連接字串的格式錯誤 (也許在索引鍵/值組中遺漏了必要的 "=")。

span.span: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).

Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 執行個體的內容。

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除所有的索引鍵/值組，從，並將所有的對應屬性重設為預設值。The method removes all key/value pairs from the , and resets all corresponding properties to their default values. 其中包括將 屬性設定為 0 以及將 屬性設定為空字串。This includes setting the property to 0, and setting the property to an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例示範呼叫的效果方法。The following example demonstrates the effect of calling the method. 此範例會以某些索引鍵/值組填入 ，然後呼叫 方法並顯示結果。This example populates the with some key/value pairs, and then calls the method and shows the results. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然設定屬性可能會隱含地填入適當的索引鍵/值組的提供者，方法沒有傳回`true`隱含提供的金鑰。Although setting the property may implicitly fill in appropriate key/value pairs for the provider, the method does not return `true` for implicitly provided keys. 這個方法會傳回`true`僅用於明確提供的索引鍵。This method returns `true` only for explicitly provided keys. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，設定的某些屬性，並嘗試判斷呼叫是否各種金鑰存在於物件方法。The following example creates an instance, sets some of its properties, and then tries to determine whether various keys exist within the object by calling the method.

member this.DataSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要連接的目標資料來源名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source to connect to.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而開發人員嘗試擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的"Data Source"索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Data Source" key within the connection string. ## Examples 下列範例主控台應用程式建立新執行個體，然後按一下 設定和屬性。The following example console application creates a new instance, and then sets the and properties. 最後，此範例會建立新執行個體，然後使用該連線到指定的資料存放區物件。Finally, the example creates a new instance, and uses that object to connect to the indicated data store. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來連接到資料來源的 Universal Data Link (UDL) 檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Universal Data Link (UDL) file for connecting to the data source.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而開發人員嘗試擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的"FileName"索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "FileName" key within the connection string. 設定這個屬性不會造成讀取所參考的檔案的內容，即使該檔案存在，且包含有效的連接資訊的執行個體。Setting this property does not cause the instance to read the contents of the referenced file, even if the file exists and contains valid connection information. 設定這個屬性並不會影響以外，表示要連接到資料來源時所讀取的檔案。Setting this property has no effect other than to indicate the file to read when connecting to the data source.

summary.span: 在 C# 中，這個屬性是索引子 (Indexer)。

value.span: 與指定之索引鍵關聯的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為設定屬性可能會將對應的項目新增至 （取決於特定的提供者的行為） 的索引鍵/值組的集合，您可能會無法擷取的金鑰，您還沒有設定明確的值。Because setting the property may add corresponding items to the collection of key/value pairs (depending on the behavior of the specific provider), you may be able to retrieve a value for a key you have not set explicitly. 例如，您已設定為屬性為"sqloledb，「 您可以擷取"Workstation ID"值，即使您沒有設定它自己。For example, as soon as you have set the property to "sqloledb," you can retrieve the "Workstation ID" value even if you have not set it yourself. 請參閱本主題適用於示範的範例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取並設定索引鍵/值組的集合內的值。The following example uses the property (the indexer, in C#) to retrieve and set values within the collection of key/value pairs. 請注意，設定提供者，在此情況下，也提供預設值與所選的提供者相關聯的所有索引鍵/值組。Note that setting the provider, in this case, also provides default values for all the key/value pairs associated with the selected provider. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item/VB/source.vb#1)]

An that contains the keys in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 中值的順序並未指定，但此順序會與 屬性傳回之 中關聯值的順序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例會建立新的 。The following console application example creates a new . 此程式碼會針對 屬性傳回的 執行迴圈，以顯示索引鍵/值組。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/VB/source.vb#1)]

Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int OleDbServices { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.OleDbServices : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要傳遞的值，對象為連接字串內的 OLE DB 服務索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be passed for the OLE DB Services key within the connection string.

value.span: 對應至連接字串內 OLE DB 服務索引鍵的值。

span.span: The value corresponding to the OLE DB Services key within the connection string.
By default, the value is -13.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE DB 服務內的索引鍵連接字串會定義可讓開發人員啟用或停用 OLE DB 服務的值的組合。The OLE DB Services key within the connection string defines a combination of values that let developers enable or disable OLE DB services. 此屬性包含值，OLE DB 文件中所述的位元組合。The property contains a bitwise combination of values, described in the OLE DB documentation. 如需有關適當的值，這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱 OLE DB 程式設計人員參考，特別是，「 提供者服務預設值的覆寫 」。For more information about appropriate values for this property, see the OLE DB Programmer's Reference, in particular, "Overriding Provider Service Defaults." 這個屬性的預設值為-13。The default value for this property is -13. 這會對應至的要求，資源集區、 自動交易登記、 工作階段層級彙總，而沒有任何用戶端資料指標引擎。This corresponds to a request for resource pooling, automatic transaction enlistment, session-level aggregation, and no client cursor engine. ## Examples 下列範例會使用兩種方式的屬性。The following example works with the property in two ways. 首先，它會指派值直接與屬性，以示範這個動作產生的連接字串上的影響。First, it assigns a value directly to the property, demonstrating the effect this action has on the resulting connection string. 然後，範例會清除並指派完整連接字串，包含 OLE DB 服務索引鍵的值。Then, the example clears the and assigns a complete connection string that contains a value for the OLE DB Services key. 此步驟會示範，從連接字串中設定的值修改以及屬性。This step demonstrates that setting the value from the connection string modifies the property, as well. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Building Connection Strings
Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PersistSecurityInfo { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PersistSecurityInfo : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林 (Boolean) 值，指示如果連接開啟或曾經處於開啟狀態，是否會將安全性相關資訊 (如密碼) 當做連接的一部分傳回。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether security-sensitive information, such as the password, is returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的"Persist Security Info"索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" key within the connection string. ## Examples 下列範例會使用兩種方式的屬性。The following example works with the property in two ways. 首先，它會指派值直接與屬性，以示範這個動作產生的連接字串上的影響。First, it assigns a value directly to the property, demonstrating the effect this action has on the resulting connection string. 然後，範例會清除並指派完整連接字串，其中包含的"Persist Security Info"索引鍵的值。Then, the example clears the and assigns a complete connection string that contains a value for the "Persist Security Info" key. 此步驟會示範，從連接字串中設定的值修改以及屬性。This step demonstrates that setting the value from the connection string modifies the property, as well. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Building Connection Strings
Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Provider { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Provider : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，此字串包含與內部連接字串關聯的資料提供者 (Data Provider) 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the data provider associated with the internal connection string.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而開發人員嘗試擷取屬性，則傳回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的 「 提供者 」 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Provider" key within the connection string. 值設定`Provider`屬性，直接 (藉由設定屬性) 或藉由建構函式，做為參數傳遞的連接字串，可能會影響集合內所包含的索引鍵/值組執行個體。Setting the value of the `Provider` property, either directly (by setting the property) or by passing a connection string as a parameter to the constructor, may affect the set of key/value pairs that are contained within the instance. 設定"sqloledb，"的屬性，例如將所有的標準 SQL 連接字串屬性。Setting the property to "sqloledb," for example, adds all the standard SQL connection string properties. 請參閱本主題，如需示範此行為的範例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration of this behavior. 對於某些提供者，將連接字串內指派建構函式會導致提供索引鍵/值組的順序，重新排列。For some providers, assigning a connection string within the constructor causes the order of supplied key/value pairs to be rearranged. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個情況下，將不同的連接字串傳遞至每個案例的建構函式。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 請注意如何設定與連接相關聯的提供者會變更物件的集合中的預先定義的索引鍵/值組的集合。Note how setting the provider associated with the connection changes the set of predefined key/value pairs within the object's collection. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 要從這個 的連接字串中移除之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 從 執行個體移除具有指定之索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果連接字串之內有索引鍵而且已經移除，則為 ，如果沒有索引鍵，則為 。

span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為方法會傳回值，指出它的成功，它不需要尋找是否有索引鍵，然後再嘗試移除索引鍵/值組，從執行個體。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. ## Examples 下列範例會建立示範的行為和方法。The following example creates a and demonstrates the behavior of the method. MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);

Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要擷取之項目的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.
The value corresponding to .

summary.span: 從 執行個體擷取對應至所提供索引鍵的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果在連接字串中找到 ，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓開發人員安全地從 擷取值，而不需確認提供的索引鍵名稱是有效的索引鍵名稱。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 因為不會引發例外狀況呼叫時，傳入不存在的索引鍵，您就不必尋找此索引鍵，然後再擷取其值。Because does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 呼叫具有不存在的索引鍵會將 null 值 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例示範的行為方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]
